header.title: XFire Mod
header.description: Displays a small image of users that have entered in an XFire account in viewtopic (when clicked on will take a user to the members XFire Profile) as well as their profile (XFire mini-profile found just above signature panel, when clicked on will take the member to that users xfire profile).
header.author-notes: Comes in both subSilver2 and prosilver flavors.

changelog.change: got rid of old image added prosilver and subsilver2 style images
Added db_update file, no more phpmyadmin. Added FAQ entry. MODx 1.2.2 HTML changes
Tightened up code for ucp_profile.php and html file
Added abiity to select styling of mini-profile for xfire
